page.title: 20OUR DOMESDAY SURVEY TODAY
page.content: Grateful thanks are extended to all the many people who have contributed information and participated so willingly in our Survey. Credit is specially due to the children of Hartpury C.E.Primary School who have enthusiastically collected and recorded this information; {************************************** {*}Craig Blake,Sophie Brewer,Alena &{ * {*}Colin Campbell,Catherine Davis, { * {*}Nicholas Dutton,David & Philip { * {*}Evans,Lowri Evans,Anthoney { * {*}Freeman,Ben Green,Sarah Hailes,{ * {*}David Hill,Thomas Jeffery,Jon-Paul{* {*}Lloyd,Jamie Lowe,Rebecca Naylor{ * {*}Haydn Pearl, Hannah & Shelley { * {*}Thomas, Neil Tolputt, Victoria { * {*}Underwood, Keir Williams, Lorna { * {*}Woodman. {* {************************************** P.G.A. Gardner (Headmaster)
